knowledge: George Washington — first president of the United States
Jupiter's Great Red Spot — giant storm bigger than Earth
Mars — the red planet with Olympus Mons
Gemstones — shiny, rare, colorful rocks used for jewelry
Gemstones vs normal stones — special minerals, cut and polished
Abraham Lincoln's stovepipe hat — kept notes and papers inside
Abraham Lincoln — 16th president, ended slavery, Emancipation Proclamation
The Nutcracker — ballet by Tchaikovsky about Clara
Schubert's Sonata D845 — piano piece with four parts
The Wild Robot — book about a robot named Roz on a wild island
Reptiles — animals with scales, lay eggs, cold-blooded
No reptiles on Jupiter — made of gas, no solid ground
Mercury — smallest planet, closest to the sun
Venus — 2nd planet, hottest, covered in lava
Earth — our home, only planet with life
Mars — 4th planet, red from iron, 2 moons Phobos and Deimos
Jupiter — biggest planet, all others fit inside, 63+ moons
Saturn — 6th planet, rings of icy rocks, 53+ moons
Uranus — 7th planet, tipped on its side, coldest
Neptune — 8th planet, gas giant, wild winds
Pluto — dwarf planet, 3 small moons
Earth's Moon — sun's light bouncing off, 6 astronaut landings
Asteroid Belt — ring of rocks between Mars and Jupiter
Egyptian pharaoh portrait — King Tut's death mask
Black holes — places in space with super strong gravity
curiosity: Space, animals, art — want to learn more
Things from imagination — favorite thing to make

skills_edge.read: Longer independent text; early chapter books; inference questions; retelling with explicit sentence structure
skills_edge.write: Capitals at sentence start (inconsistent); variety of connectors (then, so, but, also); narrative/story writing (fiction); longer compositions
skills_edge.imagine: Narrative creation from prompts; cross-language creative tasks; independent scene composition
skills_edge.math: Telling time; place value; double-digit operations
skills_edge.chinese: First character recognition; expanding vocabulary beyond home context

Usborne Illustrated Myths From Around The World
Usborne Illustrated Classics: Secret Garden & Other Stories
Usborne Illustrated Stories from Aesop: A Beautifully Illustrated Collection of Timeless Fables
Usborne Illustrated Stories from the Greek Myths
